Package it.polimi.ingsw.observers

Interface ObserverModel

All Superinterfaces:
ActionTokenListener, CardGridListener, FaithPathListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
View
All Known Implementing Classes:
Cli, ClientView, Gui, VirtualView
public interface ObserverModel
extends FaithPathListener, CardGridListener, ActionTokenListener

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void askForLeaderCardID​(java.lang.String nickname)
    Asks the player that he should send a leaderID
    void askForMarketDestination​(java.util.List<ResourceContainer> containers, java.lang.String nickname)
    Notifies all player that they received the resources from the market and that they have to choose where to put them
    void askForResources​(java.lang.String nickname, int qty)
    Asks the player a certain number of resources
    void askMultipleConversion​(int numToConvert, ResourceType typeToConvert, java.util.List<ResourceType> availableConversion)
    Notifies a player that he have to choose multiple resource types for a conversion
    void notifyBuyError​(java.lang.String error)
    Notifies a player that he could not buy a card
    void notifyBuyOk​(java.lang.String nickname, int slotID, int cardID)
    Notifies a player that he correctly bought a card
    void notifyBuySlotOk​(java.util.List<ResourceContainer> price)
    Notifies a player that he chose a usable slot and sends the card's price (discounted if needed)
    void notifyCardsInHand​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> leaderIDs, java.lang.String nickname)
    Sends players the initial ids of the cards in their hands
    void notifyConversionError​(java.lang.String error)
    Notifies a player that he chose a wrong conversion
    void notifyDepositChanges​(int id, ResourceContainer resourceContainer, boolean added, java.lang.String senderNick)
    Notifies that something changed in a specific deposit slot
    void notifyFillOk​(int productionID, java.lang.String senderNick)
    Notifies a player that the filling of a production slot has been executed correctly
    void notifyGameCreationError​(java.lang.String error)
    Notifies all players that a critical error has occurred and that the game could not be initialized
    void notifyGameEnded()
    Notifies all players that the game is over
    void notifyGameIsStarted()
    Notifies the players that the turn phase is started
    void notifyGameSetup​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> cardGridIDs, java.util.List<java.lang.String> nicknames, java.util.List<ResourceContainer> marketSetUp)
    Sends a message containing the setup information for the game
    void notifyLastTurn()
    Notifies all players that they are on the final turn
    void notifyLeaderActivated​(int id, java.lang.String nickname)
    Notifies a player that the leader card has been activated correctly
    void notifyLeaderDiscarded​(int id, java.lang.String nickname)
    Notifies a player that the leader card has been discarded correctly
    void notifyMarketOk​(java.lang.String senderNick)
    Notifies the player that the phase after the selection from the market has ended.
    void notifyMarketUpdate​(java.lang.String selection, int selected)
    Notifies all players the new information about the marbles' positions
    void notifyMoveOk​(java.lang.String senderNick)
    Notifies a player that the deposit has changed correctly after the manage deposit command
    void notifyNewDepositSlot​(int maxDim, ResourceType resourceType, java.lang.String senderNick)
    Notifies that a new deposit slot has been added
    void notifyNewProductionSlot​(ProductionAbility productionAbility, java.lang.String senderNick)
    Notifies that a new Production Slot has been added
    void notifyProductionError​(java.lang.String error, java.lang.String senderNick)
    Notifies a player that he could not produce
    void notifyProductionOk​(java.lang.String senderNick)
    Notifies a player that the production has been activated correctly
    void notifyProductionPrice​(java.util.List<ResourceContainer> resourcesPrice, java.lang.String senderNick)
    Notifies a player and sends them the HashMap of resources to use as a price
    void notifyRemoveContainerError​(java.lang.String error)
    Notifies a player that a resource quantity could not be taken from a container
    void notifyRemoveContainerOk​(java.lang.String ok)
    Notifies a player that a resource quantity has been temporarily taken from a container
    void notifyScores​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> playersTotalVictoryPoints, java.util.List<java.lang.String> nicknames, java.util.List<java.lang.String> allWinners)
    Notifies all players the scoreboard
    void notifyStartFilling​(int productionID, int qmi, int qmo, java.lang.String senderNick)
    Notifies a player that he needs to start filling a production slot
    void notifyVaultChanges​(ResourceContainer container, boolean added, java.lang.String senderNick)
    Updates the listener (View) that a resourceContainer is added or removed
    void printHello()
    Simple reply from the server
    void printItsYourTurn​(java.lang.String nickname)
    Notifies a player that it's his turn
    void printQuit​(java.lang.String nickname)
    Says goodbye
    void printReply​(java.lang.String payload)
    Multi-player Server-Side: Sends a generic reply to all the players in game
    Multi-player Client-Side: prints a generic reply received by the server

    Single-player: Prints a generic reply received by the controller
    void printReply_everyOneElse​(java.lang.String payload, java.lang.String nickname)
    Multi-player Server-Side: Sends a generic reply to all the players in game except the one
    Multi-player Client-Side: prints a generic reply received by the server

    Single-player: Prints a generic reply received by the Controller
    void printReply_uni​(java.lang.String payload, java.lang.String nickname)
    Multi-player Server-Side: Sends a generic reply to a specific player in game
    Multi-player Client-Side: prints a generic reply received by the server

    Single-player: Prints a generic reply received by the Controller
    void printTurnHelp​(java.lang.String nickname)
    Sends a mini help
    void setCurrPlayer​(java.lang.String currPlayer)
    Sets the current player for the view

  • Method Details

    • printHello

      void printHello()
      Simple reply from the server

    • printQuit

      void printQuit​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Says goodbye

    • printReply

      void printReply​(java.lang.String payload)
      Multi-player Server-Side: Sends a generic reply to all the players in game
      Multi-player Client-Side: prints a generic reply received by the server

      Single-player: Prints a generic reply received by the controller
      Parameters:
      payload - is the generic reply

    • printReply_uni

      void printReply_uni​(java.lang.String payload, java.lang.String nickname)
      Multi-player Server-Side: Sends a generic reply to a specific player in game
      Multi-player Client-Side: prints a generic reply received by the server

      Single-player: Prints a generic reply received by the Controller
      Parameters:
      payload - is the generic reply
      nickname - is the nick of the player that needs to be notified

    • printReply_everyOneElse

      void printReply_everyOneElse​(java.lang.String payload, java.lang.String nickname)
      Multi-player Server-Side: Sends a generic reply to all the players in game except the one
      Multi-player Client-Side: prints a generic reply received by the server

      Single-player: Prints a generic reply received by the Controller
      Parameters:
      payload - is the generic reply
      nickname - is the nick of the player that needs to be excluded from the notify

      Sends a message containing the setup information for the game
      Parameters:
      cardGridIDs - the initial iDs of the card grid
      nicknames - the players' nicknames
      marketSetUp - the starting marbles' positions

      Sends players the initial ids of the cards in their hands
      Parameters:
      leaderIDs - the card iDs
      nickname - the player

      Parameters:
      error - is the error for which he couldn't buy the card

      Parameters:
      productionID - production slot ID

      Notifies a player and sends them the HashMap of resources to use as a price
      Parameters:
      resourcesPrice - the price

      void notifyMoveOk​(java.lang.String senderNick)
      Notifies a player that the deposit has changed correctly after the manage deposit command

      Notifies a player that a resource quantity could not be taken from a container

      void notifyRemoveContainerOk​(java.lang.String ok)

      Notifies all players that they are on the final turn

    • notifyScores

      void notifyScores​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> playersTotalVictoryPoints, java.util.List<java.lang.String> nicknames, java.util.List<java.lang.String> allWinners)
      Notifies all players the scoreboard
      Parameters:
      playersTotalVictoryPoints - the players' points
      allWinners - all the winners (>1 in case of a draw)

    • notifyGameEnded

      void notifyGameEnded()
      Notifies all players that the game is over

    • notifyGameCreationError

      void notifyGameCreationError​(java.lang.String error)
      Notifies all players that a critical error has occurred and that the game could not be initialized

    • notifyNewDepositSlot

      void notifyNewDepositSlot​(int maxDim, ResourceType resourceType, java.lang.String senderNick)
      Notifies that a new deposit slot has been added
      Parameters:
      maxDim - maximum dimension of the deposit
      resourceType - ResourceType stored in the deposit

    • notifyDepositChanges

      void notifyDepositChanges​(int id, ResourceContainer resourceContainer, boolean added, java.lang.String senderNick)
      Notifies that something changed in a specific deposit slot
      Parameters:
      id - deposit slot id
      resourceContainer - is the container containing info about the changes
      added - true if added, false if subtracted

    • notifyNewProductionSlot

      void notifyNewProductionSlot​(ProductionAbility productionAbility, java.lang.String senderNick)
      Notifies that a new Production Slot has been added
      Parameters:
      productionAbility - the new Production Slot's production ability

    • notifyVaultChanges

      void notifyVaultChanges​(ResourceContainer container, boolean added, java.lang.String senderNick)
      Updates the listener (View) that a resourceContainer is added or removed
      Parameters:
      added - true if the container was added, false if it was removed
